MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the DG2 and DG3 postcode areas of Dumfries and Thornhill. Engineers have installed fault finding on the electrical network to assist with locating the fault and we still expect all power to be restored by 7am. We understand that to be without power is frustrating and we apologise for this. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:30 AM on Monday, 08 February 2021.
